function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spurious measurements in the data stream","Impact":"Inaccurate data collection leading to potential false conclusions and decisions","Mitigation":"Implement robust quality-assurance checks and sensors recalibration procedures","Technologies":"High-precision sensors, machine learning algorithms for anomaly detection","People":"Data analysts, researchers, decision-makers","Owner":"Data analysts, sensor maintenance personnel"},{"Description":"Unreliable data transmission due to WPAN collapse","Impact":"Loss of data and inability to monitor and respond to changes in the environment","Mitigation":"Implement backup data transmission methods, improve network stability, and reduce chances of WPAN collapse","Technologies":"Backup communication protocols, network stability monitoring systems, signal amplifiers","People":"Network engineers, data communication specialists","Owner":"Network operations team"},{"Description":"Contamination of SAMBA with contagious diseases","Impact":"Potential spread of disease through the built environment","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of SAMBA devices, implementation of hygiene protocols, and training for maintenance personnel","Technologies":"Disinfectant sprayers, UV-C sterilization devices, sensor enclosures with self-cleaning features","People":"Maintenance personnel, building occupants","Owner":"Building management, maintenance team"}]}
